瓡字的基本解释

瓡
zhí
古诸侯国名，在今中国山东省北部。

瓡
hú
古同“瓠”，姓。

瓡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》之入切，入緝，章。］
同“執1”。
汉侯国名，属北海郡。在今山东省北部。

瓡字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓜字部】　瓡； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页747第08
【集韻】質入切，音執。縣名。在北海。【前漢·地理志】瓡縣。【註】師古曰：瓡，卽執字。　又【前漢·王子侯表】瓡節侯息。【註】師古曰：瓡，卽瓠字也。　又【史記·建元以來侯者年表】瓡讘侯扜者。【註】徐廣曰：瓡，音胡。索隱曰：縣名。按表在河東，志亦同。卽狐字。○按三說不同，未知孰是，存以備考。

瓡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瓡字的起名意思

暂无。

瓡
Basic explanation of words
瓡
zhí
The names of the ancient princes are in the northern part of Shandong Province, China.
瓡
hú
Gu Tong "hu", surname.
瓡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhí］
[The entry, entry, chapter of "Guang Yun". ]
Same as "hold 1".
The name of Hanhou country belongs to Beihai County. In today's northern Shandong Province.
瓡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Gourd Character Department] 　瓡; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 747 08
【Ji Yun】The quality is incisive and the sound is in charge. County name. In the North Sea. [Former Han Geography] Huangxian County. [Note] Shigu said: 瓡, 卽hold the word.　[Previous Han·Prince Hou Biao] Hou Ji Hou Xi. [Note] Shi Gu said: 瓡, 卽瓠 also.　[Historical Records · Chronology of Hou Zhe Since the Founding of the Yuan Dynasty] Hou Yuan Zhe. [Note] Xu Guang said: 瓡, Yinhu. Suo Yin said: The name of the county. According to the table in Hedong, the aspirations are the same.卽狐字. ○According to the three to say different, I don't know which one is, save it for future reference.
